languages.text: "Как же наивно я ступала по стопам человека, взрастившего меня в золотой клетке. И как глуха была к нуждам собственного Дома. Но вы — вы раскрыли мне глаза. Как будущий {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}новатор{/g} я обязана набраться мудрости, дабы вернуть Дому Орселлио былое могущество. И неважно, какой будет цена". {n}Кассия касается места, куда инкрустирован Атлас.{/n} "Благодарю. И почту за честь и далее править ваш корабль сквозь Океан Душ — пока нужды наших династий ведут нас одним путем".

traits.locale_text: "Как же наивно я ступала по стопам человека, взрастившего меня в золотой клетке. И как глуха была к нуждам собственного Дома. Но вы — вы расскрыли мне глаза. Как будущий новатор я обязана набраться мудрости, дабы вернуть Дому Орселлио былое могущество. И не важно, какой будут цена". {n}Кассия касается места, куда инкрустирован Атлас.{/n} Благодарю. И почту за честь и далее править ваш корабль сквозь Океан Душ — пока нужды наших династий ведут нас одним путем".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "It was very naive of me to follow in the footsteps of the man who raised me in a gilded cage, and I was deaf to the needs of my own House. But you — you opened my eyes. As the future {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}, I must gain wisdom to restore House Orsellio to its former glory. No matter the cost." {n}Cassia touches the place where her Atlas is implanted.{/n} "Thank you. It will be an honour to keep guiding your vessel through the Sea of Souls — for as long as the needs of our dynasties are aligned."
languages.original_text: "Как же наивно я ступала по стопам человека, взрастившего меня в золотой клетке. И как глуха была к нуждам собственного Дома. Но вы — вы раскрыли мне глаза. Как будущий {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}новатор{/g} я обязана набраться мудрости, дабы вернуть Дому Орселлио былое могущество. И неважно, какой будет цена". {n}Кассия касается места, куда инкрустирован Атлас.{/n} "Благодарю. И почту за честь и далее править ваш корабль сквозь Океан Душ — пока нужды наших династий ведут нас одним путем".

traits.locale_text: "It was very naive of me to follow in the footsteps of the man who raised me in a gilded cage, and I was deaf to the needs of my own House. But you — you opened my eyes. As the future novator I must gain wisdom to return House Orsellio to its former glory. No matter the cost." {n}Cassia touches the place where her Altas is implanted.{/n} Thank you. It will be an honor to keep guiding your vessel through the Ocean of Souls — for as long as the needs of our dynasties are aligned."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "How naively I followed in the footsteps of the man who raised me in a golden cage. And how deaf I was to the needs of my own House. But you — you opened my eyes. As a future Novator, it is my duty to gain wisdom in order to return the House Orsellio to its former power. And it doesn't matter what the price will be." {n}Cassia touches the place where her Atlas is implanted.{/n} Thank you. And I will consider an honor to guide your voidship through the Sea of Souls — while the needs of our dynasties lead us the same way.
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It was very naive of me to follow in the footsteps of the man who raised me in a gilded cage, and I was deaf to the needs of my own House. But you — you opened my eyes. It will be an honor to keep guiding your vessel through the Ocean of Souls — for as long as the needs of our dynasties are aligned."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It was very naive of me to follow in the footsteps of the man who raised me in a gilded cage, and I was deaf to the needs of my own House. But you — you opened my eyes. It will be an honour to keep guiding your vessel through the Sea of Souls — for as long as the needs of our dynasties are aligned."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “那个人一直把我养在镀金的囚笼里。我曾一度很天真地追随那个人的脚步，对家族的需求充耳不闻，但你——你让我看到了真相。身为未来的{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}大族长{/g}，我必须获得智慧。我必须不惜一切代价，让奥赛罗家族重归旧日的荣耀。”{n}卡西娅抚摸着圣仪植入的地方。{/n}“谢谢你。只要我们的家族依然利害一致，我就愿意继续引导你的舰船穿越灵魂之海，这是我的荣幸。”
languages.original_text: "It was very naive of me to follow in the footsteps of the man who raised me in a gilded cage, and I was deaf to the needs of my own House. But you — you opened my eyes. As the future {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}, I must gain wisdom to restore House Orsellio to its former glory. No matter the cost." {n}Cassia touches the place where her Atlas is implanted.{/n} "Thank you. It will be an honour to keep guiding your vessel through the Sea of Souls — for as long as the needs of our dynasties are aligned."

traits.locale_text: “那个人一直把我养在镀金的囚笼里。我曾一度很天真地追随那个人的脚步，对家族的需求充耳不闻，但你——你让我看到了真相。身为未来的{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}大族长{/g}，我必须获得智慧。我必须不惜一切代价，让奥塞罗家族重归旧日的荣耀。”{n}卡西娅抚摸着圣仪植入的地方。{/n}“谢谢你。只要我们的家族依然利害一致，我就愿意继续引导你的舰船穿越灵魂之海，这是我的荣幸。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "It was very naive of me to follow in the footsteps of the man who raised me in a gilded cage, and I was deaf to the needs of my own House. But you — you opened my eyes. As the future Novator, I must gain wisdom to restore House Orsellio to its former glory. No matter the cost." {n}Cassia touches the place where her Atlas is implanted.{/n} "Thank you. It will be an honour to keep guiding your vessel through the Sea of Souls — for as long as the needs of our dynasties are aligned."

languages.text: «Fui una ingenua al confiar en el hombre que me crio en una jaula dorada. No era consciente de las necesidades de mi propia casa. Pero usted... me abrió los ojos. Como futura {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}, debo alcanzar la sabiduría para devolver a la casa Orsellio su anterior gloria, cueste lo que cueste». {n}Cassia se toca el lugar donde tiene implantado el Atlas.{/n} «Gracias. Será un honor seguir guiando su nave por el Mar de Almas... mientras los intereses de nuestras dinastías coincidan».
languages.original_text: "It was very naive of me to follow in the footsteps of the man who raised me in a gilded cage, and I was deaf to the needs of my own House. But you — you opened my eyes. As the future {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}, I must gain wisdom to restore House Orsellio to its former glory. No matter the cost." {n}Cassia touches the place where her Atlas is implanted.{/n} "Thank you. It will be an honour to keep guiding your vessel through the Sea of Souls — for as long as the needs of our dynasties are aligned."

traits.locale_text: «Fui una ingenua al confiar en el hombre que me crio en una jaula dorada. No era consciente de las necesidades de mi propia casa. Pero usted... me abrió los ojos. Como futura {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}, debo alcanzar la sabiduría para devolver a la casa Orsellio su anterior gloria, cueste lo que cueste». {n}Cassia se toca el lugar donde tiene implantado el Atlas.{/n} «Gracias. Será un honor seguir guiando su nave por el mar de almas... mientras los intereses de nuestras dinastías coincidan».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「金メッキの檻の中で私を育てた男の跡を継ぐなんて、あまりにも考えの甘いことでした。私は、己の家の必要性にも耳を貸さなかったのですから。ですがあなたが…あなたが私の目を開いてくれたのです。将来の{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}ノベイター{/g}として、私はオーセリオ家にかつての栄光を取り戻すために知恵をつけなければなりません。どんな代償を払っても」{n}カシアはアトラスの埋め込まれた場所に触れる。{/n}「ありがとうございます。私たちの王朝の求めるところが一致する限り、魂の海を通してあなたの船を導き続けることを光栄に思います」
languages.original_text: "It was very naive of me to follow in the footsteps of the man who raised me in a gilded cage, and I was deaf to the needs of my own House. But you — you opened my eyes. As the future {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}, I must gain wisdom to restore House Orsellio to its former glory. No matter the cost." {n}Cassia touches the place where her Atlas is implanted.{/n} "Thank you. It will be an honour to keep guiding your vessel through the Sea of Souls — for as long as the needs of our dynasties are aligned."

traits.locale_text: 「金メッキの檻の中で私を育てた男の跡を継ぐなんて、あまりにも考えの甘いことでした。私は、己の家の必要性にも耳を貸さなかったのですから。ですがあなたが…あなたが私の目を開いてくれたのです。将来の{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}ノベイター{/g}として、私はオーセリオ家にかつての栄光を取り戻すために知恵をつけなければなりません。どんな代償を払っても」{n}カシアはアトラスの埋め込まれた場所に触れる。{/n}「ありがとうございます。私たちの王朝の求めるところが一致する限り、魂の海を通してあなたの船を導き続けることを光栄に思います」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Es war sehr naiv von mir, in die Fußstapfen des Mannes zu treten, der mich in einem goldenen Käfig großgezogen hat, und ich war taub für die Bedürfnisse meines eigenen Hauses. Doch Ihr — Ihr habt mir die Augen geöffnet. Als zukünftige {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novatorin{/g} muss ich Weisheit erlangen, um Haus Orsellio wieder zu seinem alten Glanz zu verhelfen. Koste es, was es wolle." {n}Cassia berührt die Stelle, an der ihr Atlas implantiert ist.{/n} "Danke. Es wird eine Ehre sein, Euer Schiff weiter durch das Meer der Seelen zu führen — so lange unsere Dynastien die gleichen Bedürfnisse haben."
languages.original_text: "It was very naive of me to follow in the footsteps of the man who raised me in a gilded cage, and I was deaf to the needs of my own House. But you — you opened my eyes. As the future {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}, I must gain wisdom to restore House Orsellio to its former glory. No matter the cost." {n}Cassia touches the place where her Atlas is implanted.{/n} "Thank you. It will be an honour to keep guiding your vessel through the Sea of Souls — for as long as the needs of our dynasties are aligned."

traits.locale_text: "Es war sehr naiv von mir, in die Fußstapfen des Mannes zu treten, der mich in einem goldenen Käfig großgezogen hat, und ich war taub für die Bedürfnisse meines eigenen Hauses. Doch Ihr — Ihr habt mir die Augen geöffnet. Als zukünftige {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novatorin{/g} muss ich Weisheit erlangen, um Haus Orsellio wieder zu seinem alten Glanz zu verhelfen. Koste es, was es wolle." {n}Cassia berührt die Stelle, an der ihr Atlas implantiert ist.{/n} "Danke. Es wird eine Ehre sein, Euer Schiff weiter durch das Meer der Seelen zu führen — so lange unsere Dynastien die gleichen Bedürfnisse haben."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai été naïve de vouloir marcher dans les pas de celui qui m'avait élevée dans une prison dorée et j'ai été aveugle aux besoins de ma maison, mais vous m'avez ouvert les yeux. En tant que future {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}, je me dois de gagner en sagesse afin de rendre sa gloire d'antan à la maison Orsellio. Quel qu'en soit le prix. » {n}Cassia pose une main à l'endroit où est implanté l'Atlas.{/n} « Merci. Ce sera pour moi un honneur de guider votre vaisseau dans la Mer des Âmes aussi longtemps que nos dynasties poursuivront le même but. »
languages.original_text: "It was very naive of me to follow in the footsteps of the man who raised me in a gilded cage, and I was deaf to the needs of my own House. But you — you opened my eyes. As the future {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}, I must gain wisdom to restore House Orsellio to its former glory. No matter the cost." {n}Cassia touches the place where her Atlas is implanted.{/n} "Thank you. It will be an honour to keep guiding your vessel through the Sea of Souls — for as long as the needs of our dynasties are aligned."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai été naïve de vouloir marcher dans les pas de celui qui m'avait élevée dans une prison dorée et j'ai été aveugle aux besoins de ma maison, mais vous m'avez ouvert les yeux. En tant que future {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}, je me dois de gagner en sagesse afin de rendre sa gloire d'antan à la maison Orsellio. Quel qu'en soit le prix. » {n}Cassia pose une main à l'endroit où est implanté l'Atlas.{/n} « Merci. Ce sera pour moi un honneur de guider votre vaisseau dans la Mer des Âmes aussi longtemps que nos dynasties poursuivront le même but. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Beni altın kafeste büyüten adamın peşinden gitmem naiflikti. Kendi Hanemin ihtiyaçlarını duymaz olmuştum. Sayende gözlerim açıldı. Müstakbel {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Rota Reisi{/g} olarak Orsellio Hanesi'ni eski görkemine taşımak için bilgeliğe ermeliyim. Bedeli her ne olursa olsun." {n}Cassia, Atlas'ının entegre edildiği yere dokunuyor.{/n} "Teşekkür ederim. Hanedanlıklarımızın ihtiyaçları uyuştuğu sürece gemine Ruhlar Denizi'nde rehberlik etmek, benim için bir şereftir."
languages.original_text: "It was very naive of me to follow in the footsteps of the man who raised me in a gilded cage, and I was deaf to the needs of my own House. But you — you opened my eyes. As the future {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}, I must gain wisdom to restore House Orsellio to its former glory. No matter the cost." {n}Cassia touches the place where her Atlas is implanted.{/n} "Thank you. It will be an honour to keep guiding your vessel through the Sea of Souls — for as long as the needs of our dynasties are aligned."

traits.locale_text: "Beni altın kafeste büyüten adamın peşinden gitmem naiflikti. Kendi Hanemin ihtiyaçlarını duymaz olmuştum. Sayende gözlerim açıldı. Müstakbel {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Rota Reisi{/g} olarak Orsellio Hanesi'ni eski görkemine taşımak için bilgeliğe ermeliyim. Bedeli her ne olursa olsun." {n}Cassia, Atlas'ının entegre edildiği yere dokunuyor.{/n} "Teşekkür ederim. Hanedanlıklarımızın ihtiyaçları uyuştuğu sürece gemine Ruhlar Denizi'nde rehberlik etmek, benim için bir şereftir."
